src/micros

Source   Edit  

This package implements a static typed high level macro API. That means that instead of tedious manual node traversal one uses iterators and types to traverse the AST.A comparison between macros, micros

Example:

import src/micros
import std/macros
macro changeRetType(to: typedesc, p: typed): untyped =
  result = p.copyNimTree()
  result.params[0] = to
proc doThing {.changeRetType: float.} = discard

Example:

import src/micros
import std/macros
import micros
macro changeRetType(to: typedesc, p: typed): untyped =
  let prc = routineNode(p).copy()
  prc.returnType = to
  result = NimNode(prc)
proc doThing {.changeRetType: float.} = discard
